titleStmt.title: Elisij Campi. A paradise of delights: or an Elixier of comforts Offered to believers, in two short discourses of I. The confirmation of the Covenant from Heb. 6. 17. 18. II. The donation of Christ from Romans. 8. 32. By R.W. minister of the Gospel and sometime preacher at Tamerton-Foliot, in the county of Devon.
titleStmt.author: Wyne, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by S[arah]. G[riffin]. and B[ennet]. G[riffin]. and sold by John Williams Bookeseller in Plimouth,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Congregation Library, London England.
